name: Flow State
description: When you haven't taken damage since last turn, cannot move this turn, and no enemies are within 5 spaces.

name: Avenger
description: When an ally is unconscious or great peril occurred.

name: Berserk
description: When you're at 50 Hit Points or less and dealt damage this turn.

name: First Strike
description: During the first 3 rounds of combat.

name: Perfect Form
description: When you're at max HP with no conditions and cannot move this turn.

name: Bulwark
description: When you've been hit but took no damage since last turn and cannot move this turn.

name: Patient Predator
description: When it's turn 5 or later and you haven't attacked since last turn.

name: Aggression
description: When you're 25+ points below max HP, dealt damage last turn, and dealt damage this turn.

name: Death's Door
description: When you are at 25 Hit Points or less.

name: Dangerous
description: When no allies are within 15 spaces and no civilians within 30 spaces.

name: Grand Finale
description: When it's turn 8 or later.

name: Temporal Burst
description: Activate for 2 turns, recharges after 1 minute rest. While active.

name: Lucky Streak
description: Roll d20 each turn, DC 10. When you succeed.

name: Executioner
description: When you defeated an enemy last turn and it's turn 3 or later.

name: Revenge
description: When you've been damaged since last turn and dealt damage to an enemy last turn.

name: Unstoppable
description: When you've been hit but took no damage since last turn and defeated an enemy last turn.

name: Concentration
description: When you cannot move this turn and you're at max HP with no conditions.

name: Combat High
description: Activate for 3 turns, recharges after 1 minute rest. When you're 25+ points below max HP.

name: Unreliable
description: When you applied a condition this turn, it's turn 3 or later, and roll d20 each turn, DC 5.

name: Hunter
description: When no enemies are within 5 spaces, you dealt damage last turn, and haven't taken damage since last turn.

name: Untouchable
description: When all attacks have missed you since last turn and dealt damage this turn.

name: High Risk
description: When you haven't attacked since last turn, cannot move this turn, and roll d20 each turn, DC 5.

name: Pacifist
description: When all attacks have missed you since last turn and you haven't attacked since last turn.

name: Fortress
description: When you cannot move this turn, haven't taken damage since last turn, and turn 3 or later.

name: Disciplined
description: When it's turn 3 or later and you're at max HP with no conditions.

name: Gambler
description: Roll d20 each turn, DC 5. When you succeed and dealt damage this turn.

name: Suppression
description: When you cannot move this turn and no allies are within 10 spaces.

name: Overwhelm
description: When you have more adjacent allies than enemies.

name: Cornered
description: When you're at 50 Hit Points or less and 3+ enemies are within 5 spaces.

name: Tactical Advantage
description: When you're on higher ground than your target, you don't move and there are no enemies within 5 spaces.
